mapper.insert: insert into zips (z_id, address, lat, lng, content, price, u_id, reg_time,edit_time,reg_code, apt_name, hit, summary) values (#{zid}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{content}, #{price}, #{uid}, now(),now(),#{regcode},#{aptname},0, #{summary})
insert into zipblocks (zb_id, `order`, type, content, z_id, place, lat, lng, summary) values (#{zbid}, #{order}, #{type}, #{content}, #{zid},#{place}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{summary})
mapper.select: select z.z_id, z.address, z.lat, z.lng, z.content, z.price, z.reg_time, z.edit_time, z.u_id, z.hit, z.apt_name, z.reg_code, z.summary from zips z;
